coastal_alerts.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued August 18 at 2:20PM EDT until August 18 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Gaylord MI
coastal_alerts.description:
* WHAT...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected due to high
waves of 3 to 6 feet and rip currents.

* WHERE...Lake Huron Beaches of Cheboygan and Presque Isle
Counties.
